name: To The Light (itch) (OverlordNikita)
description:
Simple arcade game made special for Brackeys Game Jam.

You need to help small firefly to collect points for three Magic Stones. All you can do is change color of the firefly light. Bug will fly around points with the same color as firefly by itself.

Using this simple mechanic find 3 runes and activate it. That's all!

P.S. Sorry but I did not have time for adding any audio to this game...(
